title: "Phytoplankton PTI"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}

library(DBI)
library(odbc)
library(rstudioapi)
library(dplyr)

username <- askForPassword("Oracle username")
password <- askForPassword("Oracle password")

conn <- dbConnect(odbc(), Driver = "/opt/conda/orahome/libsqora.so.12.1", DBQ = "dbora-niva-prod01.niva.corp:1553/NIVABTST", UID = username, PWD = password)
dbExecute(conn, "alter session set current_schema=PHYTOPLANKTON")
```

## Query stations

Borrevann

```{r}
df <- dbGetQuery(conn, "select * from t_stations where station = 'Borrevatn'")
df %>% select(STATIONID, STATION, LAKEID)
```
